name: Knights of Favonius Library
description:
When played: Select any Elemental Dice to reroll.
Roll Phase: Gain another chance to reroll.

descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Select any Elemental Dice to reroll.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> Gain another chance to reroll.
storytext: "Most of the books here can be lent out, but do bear in mind that you will have to return them... on time."
